Verses: 1 dhevanudaiya Siththaththinaale Yesukiristhuvin Apposthalanaagumpadi Azhaikkappattavanaagiya Pavulum, Sagodharanaagiya Sostheneyum,

2 korindhuvile Kiristhu Yesuvukkul Parisuththamaakkappattavargalaayum, Parisuththavaangalaagumpadi Azhaikkappattavargalaayumirukkira Dhevanudaiya Sabaikkum, Engalukkum Thangalukkum Aandavaraayirukkira Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesu Kiristhuvin Naamaththai Engum Thozhudhukollugira Anaivarukkum Ezhudhukiradhaavadhu:
3 nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanaalum Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinaalum Ungalukkuk Kirubaiyum Samaadhaanamum Undaavadhaaga.
4 kiristhuvaippatriya Saatchi Ungalukkulle Sthirappaduththappattapadiye,
5 neengal Yesukiristhuvukkullaai Ellaa Ubadhesaththilum Ellaa Arivilum, Matrellaavatrilum, Sambooranamullavargalaakkappattirukkirapadiyaal,
6 avar Moolamaai Ungalukku Alikkappatta Dhevakirubaikkaaga, Naan Ungalaikkuriththu Eppozhudhum En Dhevanai Sthoththirikkiren.
7 appadiye Neengal Yaadhoru Varaththilum Kuraivillaadhavargalaai, Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhu Velippaduvadharkuk Kaaththirukkireergal.
8 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesu Kiristhuvin Naalile Neengal Kutranjsaattappadaadhavargalaayirukkumpadi Mudivupariyandham Avar Ungalai Sthirappaduththuvaar.
9 thammudaiya Kumaaranum Nammudaiya Karththarumaayirukkira Yesukiristhuvudane Aikkiyamaayiruppadharku Ungalai Azhaiththa Dhevan Unmaiyullavar.

10 sagodharare, Neengalellaarum Orekaariyaththaip Pesavum, Pirivinaigalillaamal Egamanadhum Egayosanaiyum Ullavargalaaich Seerporunthiyirukkavumvendumendru, Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Naamaththinaale Ungalukkup Buththisollugiren.
11 enenil, En Sagodharare, Ungalukkulle Vaakkuvaadhangal Undendru Kuloveyaalin Veettaaraal Ungalaikkuriththu Enakku Arivikkappattadhu.
12 ungalil Silar: Naan Pavulaich Serndhavanendrum, Naan Appollovaich Serndhavanendrum, Naan Kebaavaich Serndhavanendrum, Naan Kiristhuvaich Serndhavanendrum Sollugirapadiyaal, Naan Ippadi Sollugiren.
13 kiristhu Pirindhirukkiraaraa? Pavulaa Ungalukkaaga Siluvaiyilaraiyappattaan? Pavulin Naamaththinaaleyaa Gnaanasnaanam Petreergal?
14 en Naamaththinaale Gnaanasnaanang Koduththenendru Oruvanum Sollaadhapadikku,
15 naan Kirisbuvukkum Kaayuvukkumeyandri, Ungalil Veroruvanukkum Gnaanasnaanang Kodukkavillai; Idharkaaga Dhevanai Sthoththirikkiren.
16 sthevaanudaiya Veettaarukkum Naan Gnaanasnaanang Koduththadhundu. Idhuvumallaamal Innum Yaarukkaavadhu Naan Gnaanasnaanang Koduththeno Illaiyo Ariyen.

17 gnaanasnaanaththaik Kodukkumpadi Kiristhu Ennai Anuppavillai; Suviseshaththaip Pirasangikkave Anuppinaar; Kiristhuvin Siluvai Veenaaippogaadhapadikku, Saadhuriya Gnaanamillaamal Pirasangikkave Anuppinaar.
18 siluvaiyaippatriya Ubadhesam Kettuppogiravargalukkup Paiththiyamaayirukkiradhu, Iratchikkappadugira Namakko Adhu Devabelanaayirukkiradhu.
19 andhappadi: Gnaanigaludaiya Gnaanaththai Naan Azhiththu, Puththisaaligaludaiya Puththiyai Avamaakkuvenendru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
20 gnaani Enge? Vedhapaaragan Enge? Ippirapanjath Tharkkasaasthiri Enge? Ivvulagaththin Gnaanaththai Dhevan Paiththiyamaakkavillaiyaa?

21 eppadiyenil, Devagnaanaththukketrapadi Ulagamaanadhu Suyagnaanaththinaale Dhevanai Ariyaadhirukkaiyil, Paiththiyamaagath Thondrugira Pirasangaththinaale Visuvaasigalai Iratchikka Dhevanukkup Piriyamaayitru.
22 yoodhargal Adaiyaalaththaik Ketkiraargal, Kirekkar Gnaanaththaith Thedugiraargal;
23 naangalo Siluvaiyil Araiyappatta Kiristhuvaip Pirasangikkirom; Avar Yoodharukku Idaralaayum Kirekkarukkup Paiththiyamaayum Irukkiraar.
24 aagilum Yoodharaanaalum Kirekkaraanaalum Evargal Azhaikkappattirukkiraargalo Avarkalukkuk Kiristhu Devabelanum Devagnaanamumaayirukkiraar.

25 indhappadi, Dhevanudaiya Paiththiyam Ennappaduvadhu Manusharudaiya Gnaanaththilum Adhiga Gnaanamaayirukkiradhu; Dhevanudaiya Balaveenam Ennappaduvadhu Manusharudaiya Balaththilum Adhiga Balamaayirukkiradhu.
26 eppadiyenil, Sagodharare, Neengal Azhaikkappatta Azhaippai Paarungal; Maamsaththinpadi Gnaanigal Anegarillai, Vallavargal Anegarillai, Pirabukkal Anegarillai.
27 gnaanigalai Vetkappaduththumpadi Dhevan Ulagaththil Paiththiyamaanavaigalaith Therinthukondaar; Balamullavaigalai Vetkappaduththumpadi Dhevan Ulagaththil Balaveenamaanavaigalaith Therinthukondaar.
28 ullavaigalai Avamaakkumpadi, Ulagaththin Izhivaanavaigalaiyum, Arpamaayennappattavaigalaiyum, Illaadhavaigalaiyum, Dhevan Therindhukondaar.
29 maamsamaana Evanum Dhevanukkumunbaaga Perumaipaaraattaadhapadikku Appadi Seydhaar.
30 andhappadi, Neengal Avaraale Kiristhu Yesuvukkutpattirukkireergal. Ezhudhiyirukkirapadi, Menmaipaaraattugiravan Karththaraikkuriththe Menmaipaaraattaththakkadhaaga,
31 avare Dhevanaal Namakku Gnaanamum Needhiyum Parisuththamum Meetpumaanaar.
